data.name: Sort According to Sum!
data.description:
Given a 2D array. Your task is to write a function that would return the 2D array that is sorted in such a way that the row with minimum sum  would become the first row of sorted array, row with 2nd lowest sum would become the 2nd row of sorted array and so on..

If two rows have the same sum then the row with smaller index in input array will be placed first in sorted array.

For Example:-

```cpp
{
{10,10,8,2,2}, //sum of row is 32
{7,9,8,6,2},  //sum of row is 32
{6,3,5,4,3},  //sum of row is 21
{5,8,7,4,5}  //sum of row is 29
}
```
The function should return:

```cpp
{
{6,3,5,4,3},
{5,8,7,4,5},
{10,10,8,2,2},
{7,9,8,6,2}
}
```
Note that the rows with index 0 and 1 in input array have the same sum but in sorted array the row with index 0 is placed first.

Note: You will be always given non-empty array containing Positive values. The number of columns in each row will also be the same.

ENJOY!!

Translations are welcome!!
